mapper.select: select procode, catecode, proname, proprice, prosale, proinfo, proyn, proqty, prothumb, proimg from product where procode=#{procode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_ord(ordercode, userid, name, postcode, addr, etcaddr, hp, memo, totalprice, changedate) VALUES(#{ordercode},#{userid},#{name},#{postcode},#{addr},#{etcaddr},#{hp},#{memo},${totalprice},sysdate)
insert into pay(paycode, ordercode, payprice, payment, ispaid) values(#{paycode},#{ordercode},#{payprice},#{payment},#{ispaid})
insert into product_out(pocode, ordercode, procode, amount, status) values(${pocode},${ordercode},${procode},${amount},${status})

select to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') || lpad(cart_seq.nextval, 4, '0') as cartcode from dual

mapper.select: select cartcode, procode from cart where userid = #{userid}
